Baseball of the Future (on horses) - Full Page - June 9, 1883 - $50
A Collegiate Game of Baseball - 2 page Centerfold - August 21, 1889 - $125
The Winning Run - How is it Umpire? - August 22, 1885 - Full Page - $100
Baseball at Blackville - The White Stockings against the Black Legs - Full Page - $100
The Maple Leaf Baseball Club of Guelph Ont - Sept 12, 1874 - 1/2 pg - $75
A Ball or a Strike - Cover Page - July 28, 1888 Stunning image - $125
A Double Play - may 8, 1886 - Full page. First League Game New York against Boston. - $125
The below is from an 1885 issue of The Police Gazette
The Canadian League Champions - The Clipper Baseball Club - 1/2 pg - $75

I’ll take the Police Gazette one. Thanks.
